comments: I had Professor Havens for Cost Accounting, and she was by far the best mentor I\'ve had! She answers emails right away, provides great explanations for tough problems, actively participates in the discussion boards, and genuinely cares about students and wants them to succeed. She assigns lots of homework, but is good at helping to understand it.

comments: She\'s been my favorite professor, by far! She actively participates in the class discussions and goes out of her way to keep everyone engaged. I struggled with the material in this class, but she made it bearable. She grades quickly and fairly, and will give detailed information about the items that were done incorrectly.

comments: By far my favorite professor. Accounting does not come very easily to me, but Prof Havens broke all of my homework problems down so that I could see where I was making mistakes and how to fix them. Having a professor invest the amount of time and effort into students as she does is far too rare of a thing. I learned so much in her class.

comments: Loved this professor. She is very helpful, handouts are great, meaningful discussion responses, prompt assignment marking, interested in your success, responds quickly to email. She makes a somewhat difficult subject interesting and manageable. Wish she taught all my courses. Two Thumbs Up!

comments: Accounting is something I struggle with and when I started back to school I just had too much on my plate. Professor Havens was fantastic, really seemed to care, and did everything she could to help me pass the class. I failed, and retook the class with a Professor that just didnt\' care at all, and the difference is amazing.

comments: This professor is AWESOME! I wish she taught more classes. I actually looked for her when registering. She really breaks it down to you if you don\'t understand something. She gets homework back to you on time. She answersw your ?\'s. You can feel through her communication that she loves what she does for a living....she loves to teach.
